Specialties: Business Management and Operations, Sustainability, Rating Tools, Product Certifications, Research, Writing and Editing, Web-based Software Solutions Experience Partner Cambiati Wellness Programs January 2010  – Present (5 years 8 months) Walnut Creek, CA I changed my entire life with nutrition and now I teach clients how to accelerate their weight loss safely and sustainably.Weight loss and maintaining a desired body composition is easy - and it doesn't require hours of cardio at the gym! 
 
Cambiati empowers individuals and families to discover their personal keys to a healthier life, and to actually implement the changes they need to have long term success.  
 
We offer nutrition classes, genetic testing, 1:1 personal nutrition guidance and pharmaceutical grade nutritional supplements. 
 
Our flagship 28 Day CambiatiCleanse teaches you exactly how to eat, drink and exercise to lose fat and build muscle, and to improve your body composition and health. Participants see benefits ranging from weight loss to better skin, improved sleep, reduced inflammation and overall improved well-being. Working with the PeopleSoft system I was responsible for coordinating entry of staffing information in the areas of Faculty Affairs, Payroll and HR Benefits. I streamlined policies, procedures and workflows related to faculty leaves and sabbaticals which would ultimately feed the PeopleSoft system.
